desc: Hello.I am looking for well experienced developer with Uber style apps.Now I use custom-made taxi dispatch system which works fine but need to replace existing drivers’ mobile app module with a new one which would work better and would have more capabilities and add customer application as well. Current backend dispatch system is in PHP /MySQL and needs to communicate with this new mobile app (to be developed for iOS and Android) which will have drivers’ module (to accept rides) and passenger app (to accept new bookings like the UBER). Current taxi dispatch system mostly handles advance/pre-bookings which are sent to the drivers’ mobile app and then driver can view/accept/deny rides.New drivers’ module should be capable of:- Communication with current backend application (once booking is created it will be sent to the app and data such as different statuses will be sent back to the backend app)- Basic functions to accept / deny / advance bookings- Chat function between operators and drivers- Backed map to view where operator will see all drivers on the map with functions like to assign nearest driver by pickup location etc.- Be able to operate as well for the immediate pickups (such as UBER), if driver is not busy with advance booking- Connect with route navigation (Waze or Google)- Notifications for new bookings/ upcoming advance bookings etc.Passenger app:-	Similar functionalities like UBER-	Be able to see/edit current and future advance bookings-	Handle cash and online payments-	Multilingual (with easy functionality to add new languages in the future)I will consider only bids from freelancers and agencies with over 20 reviews. Please quote in the reply “TAXI CUSTOM APP” and possibly provide references with similar projects, techlologies wich will be used and esitamted delivery time.Thank you.
title: Mobile Taxi App

desc: I have a grading app on android and I need to add function to use camera on android devices to check three types of test papers. I have uploaded the three types of paper that can be checked by my app. I need someone who can give me code for opencv in android to add in my app.For example, on the 20 items answer sheet, the desired function is to detect the test paper from the camera and then capture photo, then detect all bubbles in the test paper and extract the shaded bubble for each item. Then compare it to the answer key to get the score of the paper.Basically, It's an android app with Optical Mark recognition to check answer sheets for quizzes, but I only need someone to do the opencv programming in android, the rest I will do myself. The app is just like the existing app called ZIPGRADE. Kindly search it on google play store to get more perspective on what I want to build.
title: Write code to check bubble type answer sheets on android with OpenCV

desc: I'm a researcher looking for technical support to develop an interactive app which would allow an instructor to design an instruction set, specify a number of trials with decks of cards and for each trial, specify the number of card decks, and back front content for the cards as text or images) and the text for a trial question/quizz. Once the set up is complete, the "game" would be available for a user who would enter an ID, access the "game", read through the instructions, access a space where they can move cards about to solve the problem set in the instructions, turn the cards over, stack them, and record a response to the preset question for each trial. The instructor would then have access to behavioural information about the user (e.g., time spent on each trial, number of cards interacted with, type of interaction (move, turn over, stack, unstack...), distance moved, coordinates, time spent touching a card. Budget range is an estimate. Would consider higher budget if adequate rationale is included.
title: Interactive Card Game app

desc: Please do NOT bid without looking at the requirements!Swift 3 versionHere is the issues I want you to fix:Profile update should work very well, add more should be small option for experience and educationPost search should not be case sensitive for resources pages and should work very well.Podcast Download(Need to be managed from App itself)Deleting all the characters in the search bar does not bring back the original listNotification pop ups should show same as website for Profile update or Request sent or Contribution Done or other notificationsI tried to edit the podcast name after this and edited the title. After editing, i am not able to see the 'SUBMIT' button on screenLogout option is not easily traceable in the app. It should be made a little more intuitivewebsite link is brokenProfile pic should show on Msg detailed view, Connection requests listingEvents listing should have Social media sharing of each event as its in response tooCreate Event screen: Below the country field should be empty and field name should be “EVENT DESCRIPTION”Events listing: Here Data is should not cut offThe goals questions are related to mentor although the switch is changed to menteeNo error message is displayed when the phone is not connected to internetOn My connections screen, Last message thing is not working very well. you can see the difference on website [url removed, login to view] and on app screen and Reply button size seems different there“Already a user? Click here” & Forgot password seems not working very well. No error message is displayed when incorrect password is displayed. Unable to select "Remember Me"All iOS screens should be designed to have a scroll view first and then we should have the controls on the UI.Battery consumption of App showed 22% , when App was in background. Generally, when App is not active, less than or equal to 10% is acceptable.After you type something in Search bar and click on Search,the keyboard does not resign. Only cancel button resigns the keyboardDate formats are not consistent and Fonts uniformity is missingUnable to change password, screen not scrolling to type passwords, keyboard return key also not working for password fieldMake sure Mentor requests work very wellOn notifications, orderby and newest first seems not working it shows “There are no messages to display” should show notifications in place of messagesIf I click on notifications it’s not workingNews page has same posts now. All titles and contents same for all posts?!! And when I am back from News external article app crashedApp should not crash or timeout anywhere! Please fixPassword field, does not warn you about using atleast one capital letter before you type. And Typo erros on Login sign up and Feedback pageSuggestion Error message should say "Password must be at least 8 characters long"Last name does not accept single quote or hyphen.Entering email ID which has + causes the App to hangOnce user is logged in Mentee profile is displayed, although the "Mentor" profile is shown as selected
